workflow.name: Newsletter signup flow with Email Verification API, Gmail & Google Sheets tracking
workflow.description:
# Newsletter Sign-up with Email Verification & Welcome Email Automation

## üìã Description

A complete, production-ready newsletter automation workflow that validates email addresses, sends personalized welcome emails, and maintains comprehensive logs in Google Sheets. Perfect for marketing teams, content creators, and businesses looking to build high-quality email lists with minimal manual effort.

## ‚ú® Key Features

### Email Verification
- **Real-time validation** using Verifi Email API
- Checks email format (RFC compliance)
- Verifies domain existence and MX records
- Detects disposable/temporary email addresses
- Identifies potential spoofed emails

### Automated Welcome Emails
- **Personalized HTML emails** with subscriber's first name
- Beautiful, mobile-responsive design with gradient headers
- Branded confirmation and unsubscribe links
- Sent via Gmail (or SMTP) automatically to valid subscribers

### Smart Data Handling
- **Comprehensive logging** to Google Sheets with three separate tabs
- Handles incomplete submissions gracefully
- Preserves original user data throughout verification process
- Tracks source attribution for multi-channel campaigns

### Error Management
- Automatic retry logic on API failures
- Separate logging for different error types
- Detailed technical reasons for invalid emails
- No data loss with direct webhook referencing

## üéØ Use Cases

- **Newsletter sign-ups** on websites and landing pages
- **Lead generation** forms with quality control
- **Marketing campaigns** requiring verified email lists
- **Community building** with automated onboarding
- **SaaS product launches** with email collection
- **Content creator** audience building
- **E-commerce** customer list management

## üìä What Gets Logged

### Master Log (All Subscribers)
- Timestamp, name, email, verification result
- Verification score and email sent status
- Source tracking, disposable status, domain info

### Invalid Emails Log
- Detailed rejection reasons
- Technical diagnostic information
- MX record status, RFC compliance
- Provider information for troubleshooting

### Invalid Submissions Log
- Incomplete form data
- Missing required fields
- Timestamp for follow-up

## üîß Technical Stack

**Trigger:** Webhook (POST endpoint)  
**Email Verification:** Verifi Email API  
**Email Sending:** Gmail OAuth2 (or SMTP)  
**Data Storage:** Google Sheets (3 tabs)  
**Processing:** JavaScript code nodes for data formatting

## üöÄ Setup Requirements

1. **Google Account** - For Sheets and Gmail integration
2. **Verifi Email API Key** - (https://verifi.email)
3. **Google Sheets** - Pre-configured with 3 tabs (template provided)
4. **5-10 minutes** - Quick setup with step-by-step instructions included

## üìà Benefits

‚úÖ **Improve Email Deliverability** - Remove invalid emails before sending campaigns  
‚úÖ **Reduce Bounce Rates** - Only send to verified, active email addresses  
‚úÖ **Save Money** - Don't waste email credits on invalid addresses  
‚úÖ **Better Analytics** - Track conversion rates by source  
‚úÖ **Professional Onboarding** - Personalized welcome experience  
‚úÖ **Scalable Solution** - Handles high-volume sign-ups automatically  
‚úÖ **Data Quality** - Build a clean, high-quality subscriber list  

## üé® Customization Options

- **Email Template** - Fully customizable HTML design
- **Verification Threshold** - Adjust score requirements
- **Brand Colors** - Match your company branding
- **Confirmation Flow** - Add double opt-in if desired
- **Multiple Sources** - Track different signup forms
- **Language** - Easily translate email content

## üì¶ What's Included

- ‚úÖ Complete n8n workflow JSON (ready to import)
- ‚úÖ Google Sheets template structure
- ‚úÖ Responsive HTML email template
- ‚úÖ Setup documentation with screenshots
- ‚úÖ Troubleshooting guide
- ‚úÖ Customization examples

## üîí Privacy & Compliance

- GDPR-compliant with unsubscribe links
- Secure data handling via OAuth2
- No data shared with third parties
- Audit trail in Google Sheets
- Easy data deletion/export

## üí° Quick Stats

- **12 Nodes** - Fully automated workflow
- **3 Data Paths** - Valid, invalid, and incomplete submissions
- **100% Uptime** - When properly configured
- **Instant Processing** - Real-time email verification
- **Unlimited Scale** - Based on your API limits

## üèÜ Perfect For

- Marketing Agencies
- SaaS Companies
- Content Creators
- E-commerce Stores
- Community Platforms
- Educational Institutions
- Membership Sites
- Newsletter Publishers

## üåü Why Use This Workflow?

Instead of manually verifying emails or dealing with bounce complaints, this workflow automates the entire process from sign-up to welcome email. Save hours of manual work, improve your email deliverability, and create a professional first impression with every new subscriber.

**Start building a high-quality email list today!**

---

parameters.content:
## ‚úÖ DATA VALIDATION

**Purpose**: Ensure required fields exist

**Checks**:
- Email is not empty
- Name is not empty

**TRUE**: Continue to email verification
**FALSE**: Log incomplete submission

## üìù LOG INVALID DATA

**Sheet**: Invalid_Submissions
**Data Logged**:
- Timestamp
- Name (or N/A)
- Email (or N/A)
- Reason: "Incomplete data"

## üîç EMAIL VERIFICATION

**What it checks**:
- Email format validity
- Domain existence
- MX records
- Disposable email detection
- Deliverability score

**Output**: 
- valid: true/false
- domain info

## ‚ö°CONDITIONAL ROUTING

**Decision Point**: Is email valid?

**Conditions**:
- valid = true

**TRUE**: Send welcome email
**FALSE**: Handle invalid email

## üìß EMAIL GENERATION

**Purpose**: Create personalized HTML email

**Features**:
- Dynamic first name insertion
- Branded styling
- Confirmation link
- Unsubscribe link
- Mobile responsive

## ‚úâÔ∏è SEND EMAIL

**Configuration**:
- To: Subscriber email
- Subject: Personalized
- Type: HTML
- From: Your Brand Team

## ‚ö†Ô∏è INVALID EMAIL HANDLER

**Actions**:
Log to invalid emails sheet

**Reason could be**:
- Typo in email
- Non-existent domain
- Disposable email

## üìä LOG INVALID EMAILS

**Sheet**: Invalid_Emails

**Data Logged**:
- Timestamp
- Name
- Email
- Reason
- Technical Reason
- Verification score
- Domain info

## üîÑ FORMAT DATA

**Purpose**: Prepare data for master log

**Standardizes**:
- Timestamp format
- Email Verifications
- name
- Source tracking

**Clean output** for analytics

## üìà MASTER LOG

**Sheet**: Master_Log

**All Data**:
- Complete audit trail
- Valid & invalid entries
- Verification scores
- Email send status
- Source tracking

**Use for**: Analytics & reporting

## üîê CREDENTIALS SETUP REQUIRED

**You need to configure these credentials:**

1. **Google Sheets OAuth2**
   - Type: Google Sheets OAuth2 API

2. **Gmail OAuth2**
   - Type: Gmail OAuth2 API

3. **Verifi Email API**
   - Type: Verifi Email API
   - Get key from: https://verifi.email

4. **Update Sheet IDs**
   - Replace YOUR_SHEET_ID in all Google Sheets nodes
   - Create sheets: Invalid_Submissions, Invalid_Emails, Master_Log

## üìã WORKFLOW SUMMARY

**Flow Path**:
1. Webhook receives signup ‚ûú
2. Validate data completeness ‚ûú
3. Verify email with Verifi ‚ûú
4. Route based on validity ‚ûú
5. Send welcome (valid) OR log error (invalid) ‚ûú
6. Merge & log everything to master sheet

**Error Handling**:
- Retry enabled on API nodes
- Invalid data logged separately
- All results tracked in master log

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
